eu.amidst.core.distribution

Class GaussianMixture

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.distribution.Distribution
      • eu.amidst.core.distribution.ConditionalDistribution
        • eu.amidst.core.distribution.UnivariateDistribution
          • eu.amidst.core.distribution.GaussianMixture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public abstract class GaussianMixture
extends UnivariateDistribution
    This class extends the abstract class UnivariateDistribution and defines the Gaussian Mixture distribution.

    For an example of use follow this link

    http://amidst.github.io/toolbox/CodeExamples.html#bnmodifyexample

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • equalDist

        public boolean equalDist(Distribution dist,
                         double threshold)
        Tests if a given distribution is equal to this Distribution. Two distributions are considered equal if the difference is lower than a given threshold.
        Specified by:
        equalDist in class Distribution
        Parameters:
        dist - a Distribution object.
        threshold - a threshold.
        Returns:
        true if the two distributions are equal, false otherwise.
